meanings.sent1: She kept missorting the letters in the alphabet.
meanings.sent2: The new employee kept missorting the mail.
meanings.sent3: The robot started missorting the socks and shoes, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumbled mess, like a computer missorting data.
meanings.sent5: The image of her missorting the colors was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: The act of sorting something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The missorting of the files led to confusion in the office.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the missorting of the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The missorting of the groceries made for an amusing mix-up at the checkout.
meanings.sent4: The chaos in the room was like a result of the missorting of the toys.
meanings.sent5: The image of the missorting of the papers stuck in her mind.
